name: Terram Pacis
goal:
Terram Pacis is an independent, democratic and youth-led non-profit organisation; established to strengthen youth active participation in human rights advocacy and peace-building initiatives.

It is run by youth for young people: 18-35 years old; herein referred to as “Youth”.
interests: Culture, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives: European policies in the fields of education, training and youth.
